Not worth the money either. Seemed flimsy. If you want a plain, oversized simple t with no special added touch, this works. But they’re much cheaper at craft stores. 评论详情: I prefer cotton for many reasons. I shop carefully. The white version of this shirt is listed as cotton, so I bought the black, too. I was surprised to find they were both polyester, also known as plastic. My bad on the black. The white is misrepresented. This is not the first time I have bought something from Amazon that was misrepresented as cotton. Going forward, I will buy cotton garments from companies I can trust. So annoyed.

评论概述: My new favorite summer shirt - oversized and stylish fit
评论详情: I love this shirt so much that I bought it in almost every single color. It’s the perfect fit - it’s oversized so you can size down one size from your normal size. Example - I’m 5’6 and usually a large, but I sized down to a medium and it’s the perfect fit. The sleeves hit right at the tip of your elbows (covering up your arms if you happen to have chubby upper arms like myself!) I just love this shirt style and can’t recommend it enough! The price point is perfect and the color selections are awesome. I do wish they also offered it in a royal blue color. I have bought 5 colors so far !!
